attributes.action: Pressure Saudi Arabia to stop the the bombings in Yemen
attributes.additional_details: Over 2000 children starve to death or die from preventable diseases in Yemen. Every week, our children are running terrified from bombs and airstrikes that have killed thousands of innocent civilians. Every day, family members mourn and feel powerless to stop the hunger caused by the war. Tens of thousands have died and the people of Yemen need our help more than ever and we should use our political influence in the Middle East to stop this deadly, unjust and inhumane.
attributes.background:
Pressure all parties to put in place an immediate humanitarian truce and protect all civilians.
Coalition forces should halt all attacks on Yemen. An immediate end to arms sales that could end up harming Yemeni civilians.
